title: Gagné’s Nine-Events Model-Based Instructional Design for Peritoneal Drainage Education

context.prior_knowledge: Basic anatomy and operating room practice experience
context.additional_context: Parallel implementation of simulation-based practical training and theoretical lectures in a BYOD (Bring Your Own Device) environment.

learning_goals: Differentiate and explain at least three indications and contraindications for abdominal drainage procedures
Perform simulated abdominal drainage procedures on a model with 80% accuracy following standardized protocols
Identify five patient safety-related complications and propose response strategies
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
